text: Politicians in New Zealand can belong to one of several political parties. Two of the largest parties are the Labour Party and the National Party. == List of major political parties == The following parties have members in the New Zealand Parliament: * ACT New Zealand * Green Party * Labour Party * MƒÅori Party * National Party == List of minor political parties == The following parties are registered political parties that can stand in elections but currently have no elected members of the New Zealand Parliament: * Aotearoa Legalise Cannabis Party * Heartland New Zealand Party * New Conservative * New Zealand First * New Zealand Outdoors Party * ONE Party * Social Credit Party * Sustainable New Zealand Party * Tea Party New Zealand * The Opportunities Party (TOP) * Vision NZ New Zealand * political party
title: List of political parties in New Zealand
